definitions.definition: A hollow tube , held in the mouth , or mounted on and opening into a diving mask , used by swimmers for breathing underwater .
A retractable tube fitted in diesel - engine submarines to allow sufficient ventilation that the engines may be used at periscope depth .

main_definition: ( underwater diving ) A hollow tube , held in the mouth , or mounted on and opening into a diving mask , used by swimmers for breathing underwater .
secondary_definitions: A retractable tube fitted in diesel - engine submarines to allow sufficient ventilation that the engines may be used at periscope depth .
